SENNGO 7 Ko hommbo wonunoo annabi Iisaa ? Ko Yahuwah nuluno annabi Issa. 1 Yuuhanna 4:9 Si nɗen faala weltinde Yahuwah, hiɗen haani jentade aaden hituɗo. Ɗo y’o tagude baaba Adama, Yahuwah taguno malaykajo dolnuɗo ka kammuli. Saa’i feƴƴi, Yahuwah e bawgal makko, o waɗi jiwo inneteɗo Mariama y’o jibin mo e nder saare Bayti Lahiimi. O inna Issa. — Yuuhanna 6:38. Ɓayri o mawni, o holuno no Allah sifori. Himo moƴƴuno, himo yiiɗuno yimɓe ɓen. E hoore cuucal, o jannuno yimɓe ɓen sariaji Yahuwah nɗin. Annabi Issa waɗuno ko moƴƴi kono ɓe aɲɲuno mo. 1 Petruusu 2:21-24 Hooreɓe dina ɓen aɲɲuno annabi Issa fii ko’o fenɲini penaale maɓe nɗen e kuuɗe maɓe bonɗe. Annabi Issa ɲawduno kadi nawnuɓe e o immintini mayɓe. Hooreɓe dina ɓen fenuno hoore annabi Issa fii y’o lamɓe Roomu ɓen piyu mo, ɓe wara mo. Ɓeydee janngugol KIBAARU MOƳƳO IWRUƊO KA ALLAH Hommbo woni annabi Iisaa ? Etee anndon fii honɗun annabi Iisaa maayani, ko woni sottugol, e ko annabi Iisaa woni e waɗude hannde.
